titleStmt.title: A declaration of great troubles pretended against the realme by a number of seminarie priests and Iesuists, sent, and very secretly dispersed in the same, to worke great treasons vnder a false pretence of religion with a prouision very necessarie for remedie thereof. Published by this her Maiesties proclamation.
Proclamations. 1592-10-18
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Richmond the xviii. day of October, 1591. ..
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
